0.name: Roulette Shark
0.fullDesc: Randomly gains 1 to {{1}} points of Blind Bet. Then, inflicts Unnerved on a single target enemy for {{4}} turn(s) and deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Aventurine's DEF to the single target enemy. When an ally hits an Unnerved enemy target, the CRIT DMG dealt increases by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>.

0.name: Shot Loaded Right
0.fullDesc: For any single ally with Fortified Wager, their Effect RES increases by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, and when they get attacked, Aventurine gains 1 point of Blind Bet. When Aventurine has Fortified Wager, he can resist Crowd Control debuffs. This effect can trigger again after {{5}} turn(s). Aventurine additionally gains {{1}} point(s) of Blind Bet after getting attacked. Upon reaching 7 points of Blind Bet, Aventurine consumes the 7 points to launch a {{2}}-hit follow-up attack, with each hit dealing Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Aventurine's DEF to a single random enemy. Blind Bet is capped at 10 points.
0.shortDesc: For any single ally with Fortified Wager, their Effect RES increases, and when they get attacked, Aventurine accumulates Blind Bet. When Aventurine has Fortified Wager, he can resist Crowd Control debuffs. Upon reaching 7 points of Blind Bet, Aventurine consumes the 7 points to launch a <orangeStrong>follow-up attack</orangeStrong> that deals minor Imaginary DMG to random single enemy targets, bouncing a total of 7 times.
